News

SJSU and the City of San José Extend Operating Agreement of Hammer Theatre Center for 35-Year Period Link: https://go.sjsu.edu/hammer-contract

The extended contract continues Hammer’s array of offerings, including professional productions, community-based works, SJSU shows, concerts, talks and film screenings.

Updates on Campus Actions on Systemic Racism Link: https://go.sjsu.edu/S-R-Updates

President Papazian offers updates on SJSU’s proactive response to systemic racism at the university.

MLML Selected by National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Link: https://go.sjsu.edu/MLML-CIMEAS

NOAA has selected SJSU’s Moss Landing Marine Labs as a founding member of its new Cooperative Institute for Marine, Earth and Atmospheric Systems.

SJSU Teach Online Summer Certificate Program

In preparation for a mostly virtual fall semester, more than 1,000 SJSU faculty members are learning new online tools for online and hybrid instruction as part of a summer program.

Honoring Resilience: Spring Class of 2020 Graduate Recognition Websites Link: https://go.sjsu.edu/spring-grad-websites

Grads can share their pride and excitement with friends, family and loved ones anywhere in the world.

Alumni Offer Advice to 2020 Grads Link: https://go.sjsu.edu/20for20

Spartan alumni offer 20 words of advice to this year’s graduating class.
